reviewText: Un able to play on dvd
Wonderful film of the book- My fathers Glory.  Beautiful scenery of this childhood memoir

I love theses two movies and purchased the two dvd's released by MGM years ago so i took a chance and bought this region B blu-ray release since i have a all region blu-ray player.  Did a comparison and the blu-ray has a much improved picture and sharpness so i am very happy with the purchase.  If you have a all region player and love both of theses films i recomend buying this.
